Description: Metadata attributes for describing a tissue or tumor sample
DependsOn: Component, Individual ID, Biospecimen ID, Biospecimen Type, Biospecimen Species, Sex, Age at Diagnosis, Biospecimen Tumor Type, Tumor Subtype, Tumor Grade, Metastasis at Diagnosis, Last Known Disease Status, Preservation Method, Site of Resection or Biopsy, Site of Origin, Timepoint, Health Care Site

Description: ID associated with a study participant

Valid Values: Tissue, Blood, Analyte, Mouth Rinse, Stool, Urine, Ascites, Sputum, Fluids, Bone Marrow, Cells

Description: The species from which the biospecimen originates
Valid Values: African Bush Elephant, Armadillo, Asian Elephant, Boar, Cat, Chicken, Cow, Dog, Escherichia coli, Guinea Pig, Horse, Human, Mouse, Opossum, Rabbit, Rat, Rhesus monkey, Sheep, Trichoplax adhaerens, Unknown, Unspecified, Worm, Yeast, Fruit Fly

Description: Biological sex associated with the specimen donor
Age at the time of diagnosis expressed in number of days since birth.
The type of tumor associated with the specimen. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.

Description: The subtype related to the scientific determination and investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms of tissue growth resulting from uncontrolled cell proliferation.
Numeric value to express the degree of abnormality of cancer cells, a measure of differentiation and aggressiveness.
Valid Values: G1, G2, G3, G4, GX, GB, High Grade, Intermediate Grade, Low Grade, unknown, Not Reported, Not Applicable

Description: The text term used to describe the extent of metastatic disease present at diagnosis.
Valid Values: Distant Metastasis, Metastasis NOS, No Metastasis, Regional Metastasis, unknown, Not Reported

Description: Text term that describes the last known state or condition of an individual's neoplasm.
Valid Values: Distant met recurrence/progression, Loco-regional recurrence/progression, Biochemical evidence of disease without structural correlate, Tumor free, unknown tumor status, With tumor, Not Reported, Not Allowed To Collect, Not Applicable

Description: Text term that represents the method used to preserve the sample.
Valid Values: Cryopreserved, Cryopreservation in liquid nitrogen - dead tissue, Cryopreservation in dry ice - dead tissue, Cryopreservation in liquid nitrogen - live cells, Formalin fixed paraffin embedded - FFPE, Formalin fixed-unbuffered, Formalin fixed-buffered, Fresh, Fresh dissociated and single cell sorted into plates in NP40 buffer, OCT, Snap Frozen, Frozen, Negative 80 Deg C, Liquid Nitrogen, Fresh dissociated, Fresh dissociated and single cell sorted, Fresh dissociated and single cell sorted into plates, Methacarn fixed paraffin embedded - MFPE, unknown, Not Reported

Description: The text term used to describe the anatomic site of the resection or biopsy of the patient's malignant disease.

Description: Label to identify the time point at which the clinical data or biospecimen was obtained (e.g. Baseline, End of Treatment, Overall survival, Final). NO PHI/PII INFORMATION IS ALLOWED.
The health care site at which the biospecimen sample was collected.
